revised_title: Assessing the Feasibility of Connecting the Ocean and Mediterranean
tldr: Monsieur Petit discusses the potential connection of the Ocean and Mediterranean through the use of channels and navigable rivers. He emphasizes the importance of accurate measurements and topographical maps to ensure the success of such a project. Petit also mentions other similar proposals, including connecting the Red Sea to the Mediterranean via the Nile and joining the Euxine Sea and the Ocean.
